record.name: Send notification when Incident Manager is appointed

rule.condition: not (same(owner in $L.file, NULL)) and (not (same(owner in $L.file, owner in $L.file.save)) or same(owner in $L.file.save, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Incident Manager in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( Incident Manager in CurrentRecord != Incident Manager in SavedRecord OR Incident Manager in SavedRecord = NULL))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Incident Manager">owner</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Incident Manager">owner</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Incident Manager">owner</FieldName></Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Incident Manager">owner</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Review (when ( Incident Manager in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( Incident Manager in CurrentRecord != Incident Manager in SavedRecord OR Incident Manager in SavedRecord = NULL)))
